name: Chad's Chadilicious Day
description:
Chad isn't a Chad by mere chance. He knows that becoming a Chad requires hard work and dedication. Now you too can become a Chad as you join him during his Chadilicious workout!

Chad's Chadilicious Day is a 2D rhythm game created in Unity and available on PC. Join Chad during his workout routine, strike poses to the beat, and start building those muscles.

Made for VenusHacks 2021! DevPost video linked here.
